title: DeadCore (Alpha) + Xpadder
description:
DeadCore is a Platformer-FPS featuring some environmental puzzles. The main idea of the game is you must climb a gigantic Tower as fast as possible while avoiding to be kicked down by its security system (robots, turrets...): on your way to the top, you will eventually figure out the truth behind this strange universe.

The Alpha version is 3 of the intended 5 main levels + 6/10 Sparks (maps dedicated to Speedrun), the demo has one small level.

I haven't finished the game yet, but so far I haven't had any glitches at all.

I haven't tested this on windows 8.1 yet, so if you DL this, then please give feedback on how it went.

The devs could use some support on this, it's a small indie group called 5-Bits Games, so if you can afford it, when the full game is released, buy it to help them bring us more of these types of games.

Minimum requirements:
- Intel Core-2-Duo 2 GHz or similar
- 1 Gig of Ram
- DX9 3D video card such as Nvidia 8600 GT or ATI Radeon X1950 pro

Recommended:
- Intel Core-2-Quad 2.4GHz or similar
- 2 Gig of Ram
- DX9 3D video card such as Nvidia GTX280 or Radeon HD5850 or newer.
  

Tested on Windows 7 32bit - Unsure about Windows 8.1, or 64bit.
